{{also|Tänzen}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|tanzen}}. The adapted onset ''t-'' in [[Upper German]] dialects (and standard German) proves that the word was not borrowed directly from {{der|de|fro|dancer}} (the ultimate source), but via {{der|de|dum|dansen}} and [[Central German]]. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈtan(t)sən/|[-t͡sn̩]|[-sn̩]}} * {{audio|de|De-at-tanzen.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-tanzen.ogg|Audio}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|tanzt|tanzte|getanzt}} # to [[dance]] ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|tanz|getanzt|h||a}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Tanz}} * {{l|de|tänzeln}} * {{l|de|Tanzbein}} * {{l|de|Tanzverbot}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Dance]]
